title.narrative: Housing Reconstruction Technical Assistance Project

description.narrative: This program is a five-year Cooperative Agreement for a Housing Reconstruction Technical Assistance Project (the Project") with the goal of promoting owner-driven reconstruction by establishing Reconstruction Technology Centers (RTCs) and Mobile Teams, and providing households with technical assistance and mason training to build seismically safer homes in the wake of the April and May 2015 earthquakes.
